deliveryAttempted(bytes32).notice: Returns true if a delivery has been attempted for the given deliveryHash Note: invalid deliveries where the tx reverts are not considered attempted

deliveryFailureBlock(bytes32).notice: block number of the latest attempt to execute a delivery that failed

deliverySuccessBlock(bytes32).notice: block number at which a delivery was successfully executed
